body_html:
Same issue with train.py from deepspeech, Ubuntu 16.04, python 3.5, CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7.0.3 on all p3 EC2 instances (Volta V100 GPUs), across a wide range of batch sizing. Seems to be something to do with libcudnn.so though, but hopefully the extra info can help:

body_text:
Same issue with train.py from deepspeech, Ubuntu 16.04, python 3.5, CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7.0.3 on all p3 EC2 instances (Volta V100 GPUs), across a wide range of batch sizing. Seems to be something to do with libcudnn.so though, but hopefully the extra info can help:

body:
Same issue with ```train.py``` from [deepspeech](https://github.com/SeanNaren/deepspeech.pytorch), Ubuntu 16.04, python 3.5, CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7.0.3 on all p3 EC2 instances (Volta V100 GPUs), across a wide range of batch sizing. Seems to be something to do with ```libcudnn.so``` though, but hopefully the extra info can help:
